messages.title: Securing a better future for Cardiff West
messages.content: James Taghdissian: Cardiff West's Fresh Start

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will fight for the investments that we deserve.
Will champion local small businesses and jobs for young people.
Committed to ensuring high standards in local schools.
Will hold the Welsh Labour Government to account.
Will work to cut crime, working with residents and the police.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Don't let the SNP hold Britain to ransom

issues.economy: Will champion local small businesses and jobs for young people.
issues.education: Committed to ensuring high standards in local schools.
issues.health: Will hold the Welsh Labour Government to account on their record.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local man wanting to provide a fresh start for Cardiff West.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for investments, championing local small businesses and jobs for young people, ensuring high standards in local schools, holding the Welsh Labour Government to account on health and social care, working to cut crime.

images.caption: James with local families fighting against Labour's hospital downgrades.
James out listening to local concerns.
James with the Conservative team in Cardiff West.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Don't let the SNP hold Britain to ransom
